name: survey-maker-api
description: Rest based server for making and conducting simple surveys.

scripts.coverage: node_modules/cover/bin/cover run test/api.js; node_modules/cover/bin/cover run test/rest.js; node_modules/cover/bin/cover run test/validators.js; node_modules/cover/bin/cover combine; node_modules/cover/bin/cover report html

author: "Andrew Waterman" <awaterma@awaterma.net>
